Al inicio del juego, éste parece un simple Shooter sobre una mujer que quiere hacer bunnyhop, sin embargo, con el pasar de los niveles y la historia detrás de CSS: Source, se nos muestra una pelea contra la depresión, una personificación de la última y nuestro "yo interior" que nos limita día por día. No puedo recomendar lo suficiente este juego, vale cada pizca de dinero que cuesta, tanto por lo bello de su interior como por su gran jugabilidad y lo entretenido que es.
Da werden Erinnerungen wach. Jahre lang gespielt, leider nur noch cheater unterwegs. Source RIP

S P E E D  D E M O N

CS: Source is the best game to play for when you don't want to stress yourself playing an exhausting and demanding fps shooter but you still want to experience the fun of that genre. This game is pretty easy, smooth to play and doesn't require your highest concentration. After work, sometimes you're just tired and want to play a fun, relaxing game, that's CS: Source for you!

With various gamemodes you can lay back and play things like Zombie Escape, Zombie Mode, bhop, surf, Jailbreak, $2000$ or the intended Search & Destroy type of match. It doesn't consume much of your time, you can just start the game and jump right in and it's pretty forgiving. You can play without even trying and still win. Good aim and movement are required to be the best player. This game is by the book the definition of an fps multiplayer shooter and most gamers feel at home with this Counter-Strike.
